org.robocup_logistics.llsf_encryption

Class BufferEncryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robocup_logistics.llsf_encryption.BufferEncryptor

  • public class BufferEncryptor
extends java.lang.Object
    The BufferEncryptor is responsible for encrypting messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferEncryptor(int cipher, java.lang.String key)
      Instantiates a new BufferEncryptor with a cipher and the encryption key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferEncryptor

        public BufferEncryptor(int cipher,
               java.lang.String key)
                throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                       java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        Instantiates a new BufferEncryptor with a cipher and the encryption key. The cipher must be one of the values defined in the refbox integration manual in section 2.2.1.
        Parameters:
        cipher - The cipher as defined in the refbox integration manual in section 2.2.1
        key - The encryption key as String
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(java.nio.ByteBuffer toEncrypt)
               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                      java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                      java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                      javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encrypts the given message. This method is called by the ProtobufMessage.
        Parameters:
        toEncrypt - Message to encrypt as ByteBuffer
        Returns:
        Encrypted data as byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
